module.title: JETT Mailchimp Newsletter
module.description: Manage settings for JETT Mailchimp Newsletter

sync_limit.label: Sync Limit
sync_limit.tooltip: Determines how many e-mail addresses should be transferred to Mailchimp with one synchronization run.

sync_date.label: Sync Date
sync_date.tooltip: Specifies the date from which newsletter subscribers should be synchronized

double_optin.label: Double Opt-In
double_optin.tooltip: Determines whether the double optin process should take place via Shopware or Mailchimp

clear_lists.label: Reset
clear_lists.tooltip: Resets the API key, the selected list and the synchronization date.

saveSuccess.title: Success
saveSuccess.message: The settings have been saved successfully.

getSuccess.title: Success
getSuccess.message: The lists were successfully loaded from Mailchimp.
